about.summary: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.

name: r-base
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set version = "4.0.0" %}

package:
  name: r-base
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://cran.r-project.org/src/base/R-4/R-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 06beb0291b569978484eb0dcb5d2339665ec745737bdfb4e873e7a5a75492940
  patches:
    - 0001-Darwin-Remove-unicode-elipsis-character-from-grDevic.patch
    - 0002-Fix-trio-config.h-include-depth-issue.patch
    - 0003-Win32-Do-not-link-static-libgcc.patch
    - 0004-Win32-Extend-sqrt-NA_real_-hack-to-all-GCC-versions.patch
    - 0005-Win32-Prevent-conversion-of-R_ARCH-to-abs-Windows-pa.patch
    - 0006-Darwin-Avoid-setting-DYLD_FALLBACK_LIBRARY_PATH.patch
    - 0007-Use-AC_SEARCH_LIBS-to-search-for-ncursesw-then-ncurs.patch
    - 0008-Linux-Do-not-modify-LD_LIBRARY_PATH.patch
    - 0009-macOS-include-cairo.h-not-cairo-xlib.h.patch
    - 0010-javareconf-Do-not-fail-on-compile-fail.patch
    - 0011-Revert-part-of-9b818c6dc00143ff18775a4015a3f43b5196f.patch
    - 0012-javareconf-macOS-Continue-to-allow-system-Java-lt-9-.patch
    - 0013-Allow-rpath-in-tcltk-dylib-LC_LOAD_DYLIB-command.patch
    - 0014-Add-luuid-to-X_PRE_LIBS.patch
    - 0015-link-Xt-to-uuid.patch
    - 0017-Check-for-changes-then-forcibly-mv-in-javareconf.in.patch
    - 0018-Use-LAPACK_LDFLAGS-in-Rlapack_la_LIBADD.patch

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 3
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  no_link:
    # These files are modified by R CMD javareconf and can
    # point to different Java implementations in each env.
    - lib/R/etc/Makeconf
    - lib/R/etc/ldpaths
    - lib/R/etc/javaconf
    - lib/R/etc/x64/Makeconf
    - lib/R/etc/x64/ldpaths
    - lib/R/etc/x64/javaconf
  detect_binary_files_with_prefix: true

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}          # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}          # [win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}     # [win]
    - {{ cdt('xorg-x11-proto-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxrender') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxext') }}               # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libsm-devel') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libice-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libx11-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxt') }}                 # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxt-devel') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcb') }}                # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxau') }}                # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('java-1.7.0-openjdk') }}    # [linux]
    - {{ posix }}pkg-config
    - posix                              # [win]
    - m2-texinfo-tex                     # [win]
    - m2-texinfo                         # [win]
    - m2-curl                            # [win]
    - m2-p7zip                           # [win]
    - texlive-core                       # [unix]
    - {{ posix }}autoconf
    - {{ posix }}automake-wrapper        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}automake                # [not win]
    - make                               # [not win]
    - libcurl                            # [not win]
  host:
    # This is a hack, strong run_exports should cause this to be added
    - llvm-openmp                        # [osx]
    - freetype                           # [not win]
    - readline                           # [not win]
    - ncurses                            # [not win]
    - libcurl                            # [not win]
    - xz                                 # [not win]
    - libpng                             # [not win]
    - bzip2                              # [not win]
    - {{ native }}bzip2                  # [win]
    - cairo                              # [not win]
    - {{ native }}libjpeg-turbo          # [win]
    - jpeg                               # [not win]
    - libiconv                           # [osx]
    - {{ native }}libiconv               # [win]
    - libuuid                            # [linux]
    - {{ native }}gmp                    # [win]
    - glib                               # [linux]
    - {{ native }}fftw                   # [win]
    - {{ native }}xz                     # [win]
    - {{ native }}mpfr                   # [win]
    - {{ native }}libsndfile             # [win]
    - {{ native }}bwidget
    - {{ native }}tktable
    - {{ native }}libpng                 # [win]
    - pango                              # [not win]
    - {{ native }}icu                    # [win]
    - icu                                # [not win]
    - pcre2                              # [not win]
    - {{ native }}pcre2                  # [win]
    - tk                                 # [not win]
    - {{ native }}tk                     # [win]
    - {{ native }}zlib                   # [win]
    - zlib                               # [not win]
    - {{ native }}gsl                    # [win]
    - gsl                                # [not win]
    - {{ native }}libtiff                # [win]
    - libtiff                            # [not win]
    - {{ native }}libxml2                # [win]
    - libxml2                            # [not win]
    - libssh2                            # [not win]
    - krb5                               # [not win]
    - libblas
    - liblapack
    - sed                                # [linux]

  run:
    - _r-mutex 1.* anacondar_1
    # Needed by R CMD javareconf
    - make                               # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}     # [not win]
    - {{ c_compiler|default("blah") }}_{{ target_platform }} >={{ c_compiler_version|default("0") }}                 # [not win]
    - {{ cxx_compiler|default("blah") }}_{{ target_platform }} >={{ cxx_compiler_version|default("0") }}             # [not win]
    - {{ pin_compatible('llvm-openmp', max_pin=None) }}      # [osx]
    - curl                                 # [not win]
    - {{ native }}bzip2                    # [win]
    - {{ native }}libjpeg-turbo            # [win]
    - {{ native }}libiconv                 # [win]
    - libuuid                              # [linux]
    - {{ native }}gmp                      # [win]
    - {{ native }}fftw                     # [win]
    - {{ native }}xz                       # [win]
    - {{ native }}mpfr                     # [win]
    - {{ native }}libsndfile               # [win]
    - {{ native }}bwidget
    - {{ native }}tktable
    - {{ native }}libpng                   # [win]
    - {{ native }}pcre2                    # [win]
    - {{ native }}tk                       # [win]
    - {{ native }}zlib                     # [win]
    - {{ native }}gsl                      # [win]
    - {{ native }}libtiff                  # [win]
    - {{ native }}libxml2                  # [win]
    # Once run_exports are in place these will not be necessary:
    - {{ pin_compatible('pango') }}      # [not win]
    - {{ pin_compatible('bzip2') }}      # [not win]
    - {{ pin_compatible('icu') }}        # [not win]
    - sed                                # [linux]


test:
  commands:
    - R -h
    - R --version
    - R -e "library('tcltk')"            # [linux]
    - R -e \"library('tcltk')\""         # [win]
    - Rscript --version
    - Rscript -e  'cat("ok\\n")'
    # TODO does not work on windows, because winCairo.dll is missing
    - Rscript test-svg.R                 # [not win]
    - open                               # [win]
     # There doesn't seem to be a way to test this one
     # - RSetReg                         # [win]
    - Rfe --help                         # [win]
    - Rterm --help                       # [win]
    - Rterm --version                    # [win]
    # Prevent regression mentioned in https://github.com/conda-forge/r-base-feedstock/issues/50
    - Rscript -e "stopifnot(capabilities('jpeg'), TRUE)"
    - Rscript -e "stopifnot(capabilities('png'), TRUE)"
    - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Lib\\R\\bin\\x64\\R.lib exit 1  # [win]
  files:
    - test-svg.R

about:
  home: http://www.r-project.org/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: 'R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bgruening
    - johanneskoester
    - isuruf
    - mingwandroid
    - ocefpaf
    - sodre
    - jdblischak
    - dpryan79
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.1
